function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of consideration for contagious disease transmission in building design and optimization","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, potential for outbreaks, and public health concerns","Mitigation":"Incorporate specific measures for social distancing, ventilation, and sanitation in building design and optimization","Technologies":"Building information modeling (BIM), simulation tools, and data analytics for disease spread modeling","People":"Building occupants, visitors, and the general public","Owner":"Architects, building designers, and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Limited awareness of the requirements for social distancing and safety guidelines in physical space modeling","Impact":"Risk of inadequate layout configurations and arrangements, leading to increased potential for disease transmission","Mitigation":"Education and training on safety guidelines, awareness of social distancing requirements, and the importance of ventilation and accessibility considerations","Technologies":"Virtual reality simulations, building performance analysis software, and safety compliance tools","People":"Architects, urban planners, and building layout designers","Owner":"Building design firms, regulatory agencies, and industry organizations"},{"Description":"Failure to adapt to the new normal of physical distancing in public and private spaces","Impact":"Continued risk of disease spread, non-compliance with health authority guidelines, and potential legal implications","Mitigation":"Integration of physical distancing principles into building codes, regulations, and design standards","Technologies":"Building layout optimization software, real-time occupancy monitoring systems, and smart building technologies","People":"Architects, construction developers, and facility managers","Owner":"Government agencies, industry associations, and building code authorities"}]}
